医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
患有唐氏综合症的尼安德特儿童揭示了古老的护理方式研究表明，尼安德特人提供了广泛的照顾，使患有唐氏综合症和先天性耳病的儿童存活了至少六年，这凸显了他们复杂的社会结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Neanderthal-child-with-Down-syndrome-reveals-ancient-caregiving-practices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Neanderthal-child-with-Down-syndrome-reveals-ancient-caregiving-practices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3961cc67-2795-4fc0-8436-63b49f076e00 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 00:55:00 -0400 Neanderthal child with Down syndrome reveals ancient caregiving practices
令人讨厌的邻居效应：人们与自己群体中的人比与外人竞争更多研究表明，人们通过与群体成员合作表现出群体内偏爱，但在资源冲突的情况下也会表现出与他们的竞争加剧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Nasty-neighbor-effect-People-compete-more-with-those-in-their-group-than-outsiders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Nasty-neighbor-effect-People-compete-more-with-those-in-their-group-than-outsiders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5eb2e923-341a-4d7e-9c2e-cffd4b14cc8a Mon, 01 Jul 2024 00:28:00 -0400 Nasty neighbor effect: People compete more with those in their group than outsiders
与城市同龄人相比，农村青少年因饮酒量较低而面临更高的肥胖风险与城市青少年相比，来自美国农村地区的青少年在饮酒水平较低的情况下患肥胖症的风险更高，这凸显了显着的地区差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Rural-teens-face-higher-obesity-risk-with-lower-alcohol-conspiration-compared-to-urban-peers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Rural-teens-face-higher-obesity-risk-with-lower-alcohol-conspiration-compared-to-urban-peers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e96bdf18-fc68-440b-9359-cc3f46987531 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 00:06:00 -0400 Rural teens face higher obesity risk with lower alcohol consumption compared to urban peers
橄榄叶的乙醇提取物有望对抗癌症和感染《抗氧化剂》最近的一项研究表明，希腊和西班牙橄榄叶的乙醇提取物具有较高的抗氧化、抗菌和抗癌特性，其中希腊提取物显示出更高的功效。这表明潜在的医疗保健应用，特别是作为抗菌剂和黑色素瘤治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Ethanolic-extracts-from-olive-leaves-show-promise-in-combating-cancer-and-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Ethanolic-extracts-from-olive-leaves-show-promise-in-combating-cancer-and-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=819747ad-204e-45fd-8b07-6f322c5978a9 Sun, 30 Jun 2024 23:42:00 -0400 Ethanolic extracts from olive leaves show promise in combating cancer and infections
Pristimerin 通过靶向硫氧还蛋白还原酶诱导非小细胞肺癌细胞凋亡宣布在《药物学报》杂志上发表新文章。细胞氧化应激升高是恶性转化引起的癌细胞失调的常见标志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Pristimerin-induces-apoptosis-in-non-small-cell-lung-cancer-by-targeting-thioredoxin-reductase.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Pristimerin-induces-apoptosis-in-non-small-cell-lung-cancer-by-targeting-thioredoxin-reductase.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0667a555-043b-45e3-b814-cbd47d6c1382 Sun, 30 Jun 2024 23:18:00 -0400 Pristimerin induces apoptosis in non-small cell lung cancer by targeting thioredoxin reductase
心力衰竭的全球负担：患病率、发病率和危险因素揭晓该综述全面概述了心力衰竭的全球负担，强调了不同地理区域和人群的患病率、发病率、危险因素和结果的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Global-burden-of-heart-failure-prevalence-incidence-and-risk-factors-unveiled.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Global-burden-of-heart-failure-prevalence-incidence-and-risk-factors-unveiled.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99609469-9796-4246-a1bc-2c461e5ea717 Sun, 30 Jun 2024 21:22:00 -0400 Global burden of heart failure: prevalence, incidence, and risk factors unveiled
研究发现，尽管经过超加工，植物性肉类仍可能促进心脏健康研究表明，与动物肉相比，植物性肉类替代品 (PBMA) 可能具有心脏保护作用，但将其归类为超加工食品需要进一步的长期研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Plant-based-meats-may-boost-heart-health-despite-being-ultra-processed-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Plant-based-meats-may-boost-heart-health-despite-being-ultra-processed-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=148ccfdd-c3ca-4033-b718-9ca131a9769a Sun, 30 Jun 2024 20:38:00 -0400 Plant-based meats may boost heart health despite being ultra-processed, study finds
生活方式和空气污染模式如何影响死亡率研究发现，不健康的生活方式选择和较高的空气污染水平都会显着增加全因死亡的风险，强调需要采取协调的健康和环境干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/How-lifestyle-and-air-pollution-patterns-affect-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/How-lifestyle-and-air-pollution-patterns-affect-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=269bc373-d858-474d-a3a9-0e4cd6653624 Sun, 30 Jun 2024 20:18:00 -0400 How lifestyle and air pollution patterns affect mortality
每周吃三次小胡萝卜可提高年轻人皮肤中的类胡萝卜素水平一项新的研究发现，每周只吃三次小胡萝卜零食，就能显着增加年轻人皮肤中的类胡萝卜素含量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Eating-baby-carrots-third-times-a-week-raises-skin-carotenoid-levels-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Eating-baby-carrots-third-times-a-week-raises-skin-carotenoid-levels-in-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e40dff24-872a-4042-8d84-4cb3189048dc Sun, 30 Jun 2024 19:55:09 -0400 Eating baby carrots three times a week raises skin carotenoid levels in young adults
研究发现，以婴儿为主导的断奶可为婴儿生长提供充足的热量新的研究结果表明，以婴儿为主导的断奶——；向婴儿引入固体食物的一种流行方法 -；为生长和发育提供充足的热量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Baby-led-weaning-provides-adequate-calories-for-infant-growth-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240630/Baby-led-weaning-provides-adequate-calories-for-infant-growth-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff86593b-c921-42d5-b896-3a5d922324b9 Sun, 30 Jun 2024 19:52:17 -0400 Baby-led weaning provides adequate calories for infant growth, study finds
